name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolVectorStore
semantic_context: Answer questions with a vector store

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.
name.ai_hint: Name of the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.

description.name: description
description.placeholder: [Describe your data here, e.g. a user's name, email, etc.]
description.description: Describe the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.
description.ai_hint: Describe the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.

topK.name: topK
topK.description: The maximum number of results to return
topK.ai_hint: The maximum number of results to return
